feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix automation name grouping by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16409
  • Add new Automation Logs viewer by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16338
  • Treat citext as string by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16413
  • fix(RowExplorer): add repeater context to prevent multiple ejections by @Stropdasman in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16289
  • Typing improvements around query thread events by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16415
  • Fix an issue where automation mode wasn't being reset to Editor by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16416

New Contributors

  • @Stropdasman made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16289

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.19...3.12.20

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Instrument license retrieval. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16417
  • Fix for binding drawer render loop by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16402
  • Charts on click by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16194
  • Revert header injection by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16423
  • Fix header injection. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16424
  • [Fixed] Use getExistingPlatformUsers to get email by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16422

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.20...3.12.21

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix rating field icon fill on hover and selected states by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16426
  • Enable workspace app on backend only by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16383
  • Improves visibility of data labels in charts by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16425

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.21...3.13.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Only offer unpublished changes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16421
  • Fixing undo/redo by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16433
  • Fix: removing misleading error notification by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16436

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.0...3.13.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: app "loading" forever by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16435
  • Partial revert "Fix: removing misleading error notification" by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16437

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.1...3.13.2
